data.description:
Step back in time and unravel the enigma of ancient Egypt with "WONDERS," a groundbreaking VR app that offers an unparalleled exploration of the Khufu, Khafre, and Menkaure pyramids. Immerse yourself in meticulously crafted 3D models, providing an authentic and detailed representation of these historical wonders.

Gain unprecedented access to the internal structures of the pyramids, examining every nook and cranny with unprecedented detail. Explore the majestic Sphinx, a symbol of mystery and power, as it guards the ancient monuments.

Navigate through time and witness the evolution of the pyramids from their construction to the present day. Encounter the old statues uncovered during excavation, each telling a unique story of the past. "WONDERS" offers a comprehensive journey through the rich history, architecture, and cultural significance of these iconic structures.

What sets "WONDERS" apart is its interactive AI feature, allowing users to ask questions and seek more details about the pyramids. Whether you're a history enthusiast or a casual explorer, this VR experience promises an educational and awe-inspiring adventure into the heart of ancient Egypt.

Embark on a captivating journey where the past comes to life, and the mysteries of the pyramids are yours to uncover. Download "WONDERS" now and experience the magic of these architectural marvels in a way you've never imagined.

changelog.change_log:
Update Highlights 

1)  New Help Video
      - Added a comprehensive help video for user guidance.

2) Introduced three exciting new activities:
     - Stone crafting with mallet and chisel.
     - Techniques for angle measuring.
     - Using tools like a wooden hammer and saw.

3) Additional Information
    - Included extra information for enhanced user experience.

4. Bug Fixes
    - Implemented numerous bug fixes to improve app stability and performance.
Many bug fix and added more information
Added characters and money bug fixed
Many bugs fixed and added some features
